HomePage.mySelf: I am a developer with experience in web and a strong interest in expanding my knowledge into mobile development.
HomePage.mySelfHidden: This site was built using Axios, Firebase, Formik, NextJS, Next-intl, Nodemailer, and TanStack Query.
HomePage.thisSiteHidden: I drew inspiration from the colors used in Windows 8 and Material Design.

ContactPage.title: Contact
ContactPage.name: Name
ContactPage.hideMessage: If you're interested in collaborating on a project, have an exciting idea you want to develop, or just want to say 'hello,' I'd love to hear from you! As a developer, I'm always open to new opportunities and challenges.
ContactPage.success: The message has been sent and I'll contact you as soon as possible
ContactPage.error: An error has occurred. Please try later
ContactPage.invalidMail: Please enter a valid email address

AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.agile: Experience in agile development with Scrum, applying best practices and QA approaches to ensure quality in projects.
AboutPage.teamwork: I collaborate effectively in multidisciplinary teams, always striving to achieve established objectives and promoting continuous improvement both personally and collectively.
AboutPage.listening: In addition to being a developer, I am a psychologist with solid experience and skills in active listening and conflict resolution. My soft skills facilitate effective communication and the presentation of ideas, fostering a deep understanding among team members.
AboutPage.creative: Music is one of my passions, and I engage in creative activities that help me relax and stimulate my innovation at work.
